alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Roger Mills; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 11:29PM CDT until May 13 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WASHITA...SOUTHEASTERN ROGER MILLS...SOUTHWESTERN CUSTER AND NORTHEASTERN BECKHAM COUNTIES... At 1129 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sayre, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Elk City, Sayre, Burns Flat, Canute, Carter, Foss, Delhi and Foss Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
